pageTitle: Lost, stolen or damaged Jobcentre Plus Discount photocard
description: What you should know if your Jobcentre Plus Discount photocard has been lost, stolen or is faulty.

breadcrumbs.title: Lost, stolen or damaged Jobcentre Plus Discount photocard

title.title: Lost, stolen or damaged Jobcentre Plus Discount photocard

texts: {"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Replace your card at a Jobcentre Plus office"}
You need to apply for a replacement Jobcentre Plus Discount photocard at your local Jobcentre Plus office.
You will need to get the Jobcentre Plus Discount re-set on your Oyster card once you've got your replacement photocard. You can do this at Tube stations, Oyster Ticket Stops and Visitor Centres .
If you've lost your Oyster card as well, you'll need to get a new one before you can re-set the discount.
